meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>net</radical> of <radical>thread</radical> for catching a <radical>turkey</radical>. But, it must be <kanji>spread out</kanji> and you must <kanji>arrange</kanji> it first.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>spread out</kanji> your net and <kanji>arrange</kanji> it just so. You expect it to catch a turkey, but instead you catch the ancient Egyptian god <reading>Ra</reading> (ら).
